definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Jiao4 yu4 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: Mr. Karras, a doctoral student in education at Ohio State.
sentences.chinese: 在俄亥俄州立大學攻讀教育學博士的卡拉斯先生。

sentences.english: The interpretation of the public character of education can only be based on its pedagogic property.
sentences.chinese: 對教育公共性特徵的闡釋，只能依據其教育學屬性。

sentences.english: Graduated from University of Northampton UK with Education studies and Psychology joint honors.
sentences.chinese: 畢業於英國北安普敦大學，教育學心理學雙學士學位。

sentences.english: Iwim now a distance educ student.
sentences.chinese: 我方今是一名長途教育學員。

sentences.english: There are three big divisions in the development of pedagogy.
sentences.chinese: 在教育學的發展過程中，出現了三次大的分解。

sentences.english: In 2006, the third time was that Tianjin university founded a doctor station of vocational education.
sentences.chinese: 第三次是2006年天津大學創立職業教育學博士點。

sentences.english: With her sister during the 1880s, she also established a training school for kindergarten teachers.
sentences.chinese: 另外，她還和姐姐合作撰寫了一些著名的教育學論著。

sentences.english: Existing remote open education students more than 1300 people.
sentences.chinese: 現有遠程開放教育學員1300餘人。

sentences.english: At present, the value orientation of the pedagogy teaching to non-pedagogy majors in China's normal colleges and universities is very obscure.
sentences.chinese: 當前高師公共教育學教學存在著價值取向不明的問題。

sentences.english: Interestingly, the appeal of studying education seems to be slipping.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，學習教育學的熱度一直在不斷下滑。

sentences.english: I'm now a distance educine student.
sentences.chinese: 我方今是一名長途教育學員。

sentences.english: Teachers and educators have an intuitive feeling for this, I think.
sentences.chinese: 我想教師和教育學家對此會有一個直觀的感覺。

sentences.english: Some courses from neural science, psychology, sociology, and education can be applied to the minor as well.
sentences.chinese: 還可以申請輔修神經科學，心理學，社會學和教育學。

sentences.english: Max van Manen is the major representative of phenomenological pedagogy in North America.
sentences.chinese: 範梅南是北美現象學教育學的主要代表人物。

sentences.english: Paulo Freire is a representative of the Pedagogy of the Oppressed.
sentences.chinese: 弗萊雷是被壓迫教育學的代表人物。

sentences.english: Can say content of matriculation of pedagogic graduate student is gianter.
sentences.chinese: 可以說教育學研究生入學考試內容是比較龐大的。

definition: the tone of a school/campus atmosphere

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2
